keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

lead_paragraph: Four times as many babies were born with microcephaly this year as in 2015 in Colombia, home to the second-largest Zika epidemic after Brazil.
snippet: Four times as many babies were born with microcephaly this year as in 2015 in Colombia, home to the second-largest Zika epidemic after Brazil....

headline.main: Colombia Reports Major Rise in Birth Defect Amid Zika Crisis
